name: Quizmind
description:
Quizmind is a free mobile quiz game where you guess the popular song titles and brands names by logo. 

CONTROL SCHEME

 Every level contain emoji photo or brand logo and set of random letters, all you need to do is to test your skills and logic and guess the correct answer. 

The game is still in development. Chech for updates!

Special thanks to my mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski.
